papers.title: Adaptive Machine Learning and Automatic Tuning of Intense Electron Bunches in Particle Accelerators
authors: Machine learning and in particular neural networks
have been around for a very long time. In recent years
thanks to growth in computing power
neural networks have reshaped many fields of research
and even particle accelerators. In this tutorial

I will first present an introduction to machine learning for beginners and will also touch on a few aspects of adaptive control theory. I will then introduce some problems in particle accelerators and present how they have been approached utilizing machine learning techniques as well as adaptive machine learning approaches
for automatically tuning extremely short and high intensity electron bunches in free electron lasers.
